snippet: Mayor Stephanie A. Miner, who announced her move in a letter to city workers, said 69 positions on the payroll paid less than that amount.
abstract: Syracuse Mayor Stephanie A Miner raises minimum wage for city employees to $15 an hour, effective immediately.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Stephanie A. Miner, who announced her move in a letter to city workers, said 69 positions on the payroll paid less than that amount.

headline.print_headline: $15 Now Minimum Wage for City Employees in Syracuse
headline.main: Syracuse Leader Raises Public Workers’ Minimum Wage to $15, Immediately
